alert.note: Alert for Knox (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 28 at 5:00PM CDT until August 28 at 5:30PM CDT by NWS Knoxville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Morristown has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Knox County in east Tennessee... * Until 630 PM EDT. * At 559 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles east of Knoxville, moving northwest at 5 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Knoxville, House Mountain State Park, Maloneyville, Lake Forest, Mascot and Kimberlin Heights. This includes the following highways... Interstate 40 in Tennessee between mile markers 387 and 401. Interstate 75 in Tennessee between mile markers 108 and 110. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
